room_title: Escape room "Over the Falls" by Escape City Buffalo in Buffalo
review: The level of immersion in this room is unparalleled. They draw you in so well and quickly. The sets, the sounds, and even the puzzles all make you feel like you're really on a ship. Easily one of the best I've done

room_title: Escape room "Over the Falls" by Escape City Buffalo in Buffalo
review: We did both of their rooms this afternoon, and loved every minute of both of them! I have never seen such a well-built set, and the games themselves were fun, challenging, and fair. Can't wait for their new rooms to come out!

room_title: Escape room "Over the Falls" by Escape City Buffalo in Buffalo
review: We did both rooms tonight and they were amazing! We felt like we were actually on a ship. Unbelievable how talented these guys are. They should seriously be building sets in Hollywood. We had a great time and will be back as soon as the next one opens. Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Over the Falls" by Escape City Buffalo in Buffalo
review: We did not go over the falls and had a blast. I can't wait for the new rooms to open!

room_title: Escape room "Over the Falls" by Escape City Buffalo in Buffalo
review: Did both rooms today. Absolutely love this place and the Over the Falls scenario! Our game master was very friendly and helpful. Best escape room so far!
